Mailing Address: c/o City of Kelowna, Regional Services1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4
Primary Contact: Andrea Mackintosh, Event Coordinator; Phone: 250.212.5523; Email: events@smartTRIPS.ca
Service Details: Bike to Work Week:- Encourages everyone in the workplace to create a team and cycle to work during Bike to Work Week- Team Leads will receive a kit with great resources and prizes to reward team members for cycling- Employees will sign up through the Team Leader at your workplace, or by registering themselves and joining their workplace team online- Those who are not part of a workplace environment can register as an individual- Individuals are not eligible for free T-shirts and team prizes, but they can attend the Celebration Stations for free snacks and drinks, bike tune-ups, and station prize draws Bike to School Week:  - Each year students of all ages are invited to participate- Events are coordinated through the school with the assistance of smartTRIPS staff- Schools can receive a tool kit to help them get started, including incentives and prizes offered to those schools with the highest participation rate
